meanings.definition: The quality or state of being desultory.
meanings.sent1: Her desultorinesses in completing tasks often led to unfinished projects.
meanings.sent2: The desultorinesses of his speech made it hard to follow his train of thought.
meanings.sent3: The desultorinesses of the puppy's playfulness was both endearing and frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The desultorinesses of the wind blowing in different directions symbolized the chaos of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The desultorinesses of the scattered puzzle pieces made it challenging to put together.

meanings.sent1: The desultorinesses of his attendance record showed a pattern of inconsistency.
meanings.sent2: Her desultorinesses in arriving on time caused disruptions in the schedule.
meanings.sent3: The desultorinesses of the weather forecast made planning outdoor activities difficult.
meanings.sent4: The desultorinesses of the flickering light gave the room an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The desultorinesses of the dripping faucet echoed through the empty house.

meanings.definition: Random or disconnected in a way that lacks focus or direction.
meanings.sent1: The desultorinesses chatter of the squirrels in the park created a lively background noise.
meanings.sent2: Her desultorinesses storytelling style made it hard to follow the plot.
meanings.sent3: The desultorinesses arrangement of colors in the painting gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent4: The desultorinesses pattern of stars in the sky formed imaginary shapes.
meanings.sent5: The desultorinesses dance moves of the street performer entertained the crowd.
